titleStmt.title: The poore-mans preacher A sermon preached at S. Maries Spittle in London, on Tuesday in Easter weeke, being April. 7. 1607. By Ro. Wakeman Bachelar of Diuinitie, and fellow of Ballioll College in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Wakeman, Robert, 1575 or 6-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Hatfield for Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: First four words of title within cartouche.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
